content: ch1 turn row 5 6sc ch1 turn row 4 6sc ch1 turn row 6 6sc ch1 turn row 5 6sc ch1 turn row 7 4sc decrease ch1 turn row 6 decrease 4sc ch1 turn row 8 5sc row 7 5sc slip_stitch to fasten_off leave long tail for sewing slip_stitch to fasten_off leave long tail for sewing round 32 top front corner round 38 round 30 round 37 sew the back of the leg right along the tail attatch leg as shown the top front corner of the leg 10st apart © danielle bash page 6 back feet make 2 in color b round 1 8sc in magic_ring 8 round 2-3 single_crochet around 8 round 4 single_crochet decrease 5sc 7 round 5 single_crochet around 7 round 6 single_crochet decrease 4sc 6 round 7-9 single_crochet around 6 slip_stitch to fasten_off leave long tail for sewing do not stuff the feet instead simply flatten them attach feet to leg as shown make sure the start ring is faceing down when attaching the feet © danielle bash
